page.title: 01EASTLEIGH GENERAL
page.content: The area is centred around the railway junction and works.It is predominantly a town of small industry surrounded by water meadows and farmland. The airport is a very large area partly within the{D Block}with a strong influence on the inhabitants. The area is expanding quite rapidly and the town centre is undergoing a lot of re_development,at present consisting mainly of demolition to make way for new shopping precincts. Most of the housing development is on the outskirts of the town in Boyatt Wood and Bishopstoke. An old gravel working which was opened to supply the M27 motorway has been landscaped to provide watersports faciliies.
